All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Authorisation
    Authorisation class which handles accounts within the database It enables account permissions for Restaurant, Warehouse and Driver
    CorsFilter
    CorsFilter class which implements the ContainerResponseFilter.
    DbConnection
    DbConnection Class for handling SQL connection for the backend
    Driver
    Driver class including information about driver schedules and assigning orders
    JsonTools
    JsonTools Class to provide other classes, in particular web resources, with possibility to parse String into JSON
    Restaurant
    Restaurant Class which handles stocks information, ordering stock and recieving orders, creating meals and checking prices
    ServerLog
    ServerLog Class which provides a simple logging system for the backend Static method used to ensure one log is running for one server instance
    StartServer
    StartServer Class which is the main class used to start the server
    Warehouse
    Warehouse Class which handles stocks information, sending orders to restaurant and assigning a driver to deliver the order
